Moving Projects

You move a Serena ChangeMan Version Manager project to relocate the project and all of its versioned files to the destination location within the same project database. The project's archives do not move; the versioned files that you move reference the archives in their original location.

To move a project using the menu items:

  1. In the Project pane, select the project you want to move.

  2. Select Edit | Move. The Project Browse dialog box appears.

  3. Select a destination project or subproject in the project database. To move the project beneath the project database, select the project database.

  4. Click OK. The project is moved to the new location.

To move projects using drag and drop:

  1. In the Project pane, select the project you want to move.

  2. Drag the project over a project or subproject within the project's project database, or drag the project over the name of the project database.

  3. Drop the project over the destination. The project is moved to the new location.

    Note: Depending on how you've set up your Version Manager environment, a dialog box may ask for confirmation to move the project. Click Yes to confirm the move or No to abort.
